metadata.title: CVE-2024-40952 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ocfs2: fix NULL pointer dereference in ocfs2_journal_dirty()bdev->bd_super has been removed and commit 8887b94d9322 change the usagefrom bdev->bd_super to b_assoc_map->host->i_sb.  This introduces thefollowing NULL pointer dereference in ocfs2_journal_dirty() sinceb_assoc_map is still not initialized.  This can be easily reproduced byrunning xfstests generic/186, which simulate no more credits.[  134.351592] BUG: kernel NULL pointer dereference, address:0000000000000000...[  134.355341] RIP: 0010:ocfs2_journal_dirty+0x14f/0x160 [ocfs2]...[  134.365071] Call Trace:[  134.365312]  <TASK>[  134.365524]  ? security_file_permission+0x29/0x50[  134.377644]  vfs_clone_file_range+0xfe/0x320[  134.378268]  ioctl_file_clone+0x45/0xa0[  134.378853]  do_vfs_ioctl+0x457/0x990[  134.379422]  __x64_sys_ioctl+0x6e/0xd0[  134.379987]  do_syscall_64+0x5d/0x170[  134.380550]  entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x76/0x7e[  134.381231] RIP: 0033:0x7fa4926397cb[  134.381786] Code: 73 01 c3 48 8b 0d bd 56 38 00 f7 d8 64 89 01 48 83 c8ff c3 66 2e 0f 1f 84 00 00 00 00 00 90 f3 0f 1e fa b8 10 00 00 00 0f 05<48> 3d 01 f0 ff ff 73 01 c3 48 8b 0d 8d 56 38 00 f7 d8 64 89 01 48[  134.383930] RSP: 002b:00007ffc2b39f7b8 EFLAGS: 00000246 ORIG_RAX:0000000000000010[  134.384854] RAX: ffffffffffffffda RBX: 0000000000000004 RCX:00007fa4926397cb[  134.385734] RDX: 00007ffc2b39f7f0 RSI: 000000004020940d RDI:0000000000000003[  134.386606] RBP: 0000000000000000 R08: 00111a82a4f015bb R09:00007fa494221000[  134.387476] R10: 0000000000000000 R11: 0000000000000246 R12:0000000000000000[  134.388342] R13: 0000000000f10000 R14: 0000558e844e2ac8 R15:0000000000f10000[  134.389207]  </TASK>Fix it by only aborting transaction and journal in ocfs2_journal_dirty()now, and leave ocfs2_abort() later when detecting an aborted handle,e.g. start next transaction. Also log the handle details in this case.
